problem.markdown: >>What type of lateral force-resisting system does the Willis Tower use?<< ( ) a moment-resisting frame ( ) a braced frame ( ) a shearwall (x) a tube-framed system ( ) I don’t know [explanation] The Willis Tower uses a tube-framed system to resist lateral loads. Fazlur Kahn introduced this type of system for buildings, allowing the heights of buildings to increase dramatically. [explanation]
problem.p: What type of lateral force-resisting system does the Willis Tower use?

choicegroup.label: What type of lateral force-resisting system does the Willis Tower use?

div.p: The Willis Tower uses a tube-framed system to resist lateral loads. Fazlur Kahn introduced this type of system for buildings, allowing the heights of buildings to increase dramatically.
